Reviews.Title: Amazing mid-level Laptop
Reviews.Author: James Underwood
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Lenovo Ideapad P500 for my birthday from Best Buy a while back, and I love it.I'll list the pros and cons of this system for easy readingPros*2.5 Ghz processor, very fast, can run several processes at once*HD monitor WITH HDMI out*beautiful aluminum casing*comes with Windows 8*excellent build quality*runs cool for hours*simulated surround sound speakers*750 GB of storage space*HD webcam and micCons*the trackpad is left-oriented*the trackpad has no spacer to differentiate the left or right button, and in fact, may click the buttons if pressed too hard*the casing can dig into your hand or wrist when using*the Intel Centrino 2230 Wireless Card DOES NOT WORKThe Centrino Wireless cards have a reputation for being poorly made (just do a Google search), and no matter how many times you try to install the drivers, you will not be able to get a reliable wireless connection on it for more than an hour or two. The best idea is to buy a $20 USB Wifi receiver to go with it if you do intend on buying this laptop.Otherwise, it's well worth the money you pay for it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Darlene Nicholson
Reviews.Content: I've used this laptop every day since receiving it and haven't had any issues. It's super-fast, and I ESPECIALLY love the fact that it doesn't get HOT underneath, since the vent is on the side. The seller got it to me very quick with no issues. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: JaCoy
Reviews.Content: This computer is a great choice. It includes a super sound system with excellent quallity. I do a lot of online gaming and it will run at very high speeds. Overall its a beautiful display and great quality computer.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo - IdeaPad 15.6" Laptop
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: Bought it about a week ago after bringing back HP touch envy with less on specs and smaller..Check out my YouTube video on my LENOVO IDEAPAD P500 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lxc8GhElmU0

Reviews.Title: Works w/ Minecraft
Reviews.Author: H. Brune
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my son who loves to play minecraft but also needed a computer for school.  He loves it and it works great so far for everything he needs!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Great performance and Very well constructed.  Additionally, you have the option to light up the keyboard.  The screen is also big and clear.  The weight is also not that heavy.

Reviews.Title: Had potential, but fell short for me
Reviews.Author: Ian Smith
Reviews.Content: Greetings laptop enthusiasts and perspective buyers. I bought this laptop in December after my Dell Studio 1555 died for the the third time in about four years. At first, there were many things to like about this laptop: It has a smooth and sleek texture, incredible storage (750 gb), its speedy, and its affordable. However, it did not take long for me to find some negatives. My minor complaints are that I found the keyboard to be too large because of unnecessary number pad to the right, the touch pad was clanky, and I was disappointed that my laptop did not come with the backlit keyboard. My MAJOR complaint about this laptop was one I encountered on the first night of its arrival; wifi connectivity issues. In certain parts of my house I was not able to connect to the internet or maintain a connection. The Lenovo wifi struggle is REAL. This apparently is an issue that Lenovo buyers are familiar with all too often. I called Lenovo and they failed to help and told me to contact my internet provider. My internet provider shipped a new router to the house, but by the time it came I had already sent the laptop back. I doubt the router would have solved the issue. I ended up doing the unimaginable and bought the new macbook pro with retina display. I never thought I would buy an Apple computer, but that's a whole 'nother review. Long story short, I probably stay away from Lenovos.

Reviews.Title: Great Lappy
Reviews.Author: M. Huskey
Reviews.Content: my faithful desktop took a dive, and this was the perfect replacement. It's fast, sturdy (no cheap plastic bits) and very sleek. Just as good as a mac.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING, WELL DONE!
Reviews.Author: Barry#1
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing laptop with extremely few issues. This runs at amazing speeds for all different types of things. Im a big online gamer and it works exceptionally well with games such as minecraft, Black ops, and WOW. This laptop is well worth your money. Overall this computer is great!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice but I'm still trying to figure out how to install linux on the thing
Reviews.Author: Savannah Brooks "The girl with the most cake"
Reviews.Content: This machine is awesome other than the fact that it's very difficult to install linux on. Specifically you can't boot it from a livecd, and I've had difficulty getting a liveusb to work either. It's fast, light, and I appreciate the toggle backlighting on the keyboard and the full number pad. Although I got a much better deal on this machine at my local Bestbuy when my last laptop bit the dust.

Reviews.Title: My favorite thing
Reviews.Author: MelissaInTheSky
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop.  So much.  I would marry it.  It is fast and runs all of my imaging and audio programs flawlessly and I love the extra features like the back lit keyboard and the touch screen.  Super fun.  Mine has the i5-3230M, not sure if that makes much of a difference.  And I have a 1 TB hard drive.  But I think it is still this same model.  It is a powerhouse for the money.  I love it so much I even managed to learn wacky Windows 8!  I have had it for a month now and not one problem.  Streams like the wind.  No problems with the wifi or the touch pad or any of the stuff folks here have mentioned.  Just great computin'.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Machine
Reviews.Author: Gage Goulding
Reviews.Content: The laptop has provided exceptional speeds and usage. I use it for business as well as personal use. I have never had a problem with Wi-Fi connectivity or Bluetooth. Along with the amazing range, I also can download, store, and update many programs. This is a key when I need to stay on top of things. Personally I would recommend this ultra sleek laptop to anyone.

Reviews.Title: turns off for no reason, also has to repair itself
Reviews.Author: J. Bill Shane
Reviews.Content: I brought this in December did not use it much as we went on vacation for a month and took another laptop with it . I started using it recently and found it shuts down for no reason, it says it found a problem and has to reboot than it says it has to go restore to fix it .the laptop is sleek looking and looks high quality on the outside but maybe could have used some "sony guts" . all you snl guys with get that one

Reviews.Title: Awesome laptop for the money...
Reviews.Author: JimTheSoundman
Reviews.Content: Just bought this laptop four days ago and I think it's excellent. I have the upgraded one with the i7-3520M processor, 8 gigs of RAM and 1TB HDD.I hated Win8 however so I downloaded a freeware program called Start Menu 8 which configures the desktop to look like Windows 7. I agree with the other reviewers that it has great build quality and runs blisteringly fast. Backlit keyboard is awesome. Runs very cool. I've had no problems with the wireless card. Very little bloatware. The only drawback is that the keyboard is somewhat hard to type on, compared to other laptops I've owned. Trackpad has a lot of features similar to a smartphone with two-finger scroll, three-finger swipe, etc, so make sure you investigate that thoroughly to learn all the cool features it has. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Received a defective laptop.
Reviews.Author: Sri Mattu
Reviews.Content: It is aweful to receive a laptop that had defective network card. Wi-Fi is not working. Spent a day working with Lenovo to fix the problem. As per Lenovo I need to send laptop to their serive centre. This is my first lenovo and was quite excited when I got it first time. I will be very hesitant to buy another Lenovo.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop I ever used.
Reviews.Author: Alexander Wheaten
Reviews.Content: I'd like to piggie back on what Mrs. Darlene said. This is the best Laptop I ever had. Its slim, quiet and performance is great. I bought mine from best buy. And I would say this as advice: Don't buy a computer online unless you you're building it yourself. I bought an Acer. They may make some good computers, that one cost me the lost of some precious video and pictures. So I am giving the life time ban to Acer. This Lenovo is pretty good. And handles Wins 8 well.

Reviews.Title: Mouse often infuriatingly sensitive
Reviews.Author: brooke
Reviews.Content: Edit: You can change the sensitivity settings for the touchpad through terminal (linux...not 100% sure you can do it through command line on Windows, but it's probably possible!) and now it is delightful to use!! 4.25/5It is a great computer other than the fact that the touchpad is WAY TOO sensitive. I will try to click on something and end up clicking around it just due to how sensitive the touchpad is. (fixed! :) )I even set it to lowest sensitivity and to disable the touchpad while I am typing. Regardless, if my palm touches the touchpad while typing, it exits the window and inevitably screws something up. (fixed! :) )Speakers being located at the bottom is weird and makes it hard to watch something with lappy in your lap. (this is still pretty weird)Other than that, it is great. However, the sensitivity gets annoying SO QUICKLY. I ACCIDENTALLY clicked out of this input box 3 times, it gets INFURIATING. (fixed!)3.5/5 (fixed! :) 4.25/5)

Reviews.Title: ethernet jack ? Ok now I understand
Reviews.Author: Lumiere
Reviews.Content: Just setting up my new P500 BUT the ethernet cable will not plug into the jack on the P500. The plug is too large. What is going on here. I used this cable for 5 years on my old G530.UPDATE Ok now I understand thanks to TS. Up grade my rating to 4.  Too early for more comments, still learning Win 8.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: Frank Caprio
Reviews.Content: Did not work. Had to return at my expense. Did not work from day one.  Monitor no good and power supply no good.
